column5: Just wondering if anyone knows of a tackle shop in or around Crystal Falls or Sturgeon Falls....Going up to Lake Tomiko/Chebogomog the 8th of September for a week....would like to stop in and get some info on the lake as well as some local tackle and bait....I have fished it before in the spring and did well, never fished it in the fall....Thanks for any info!  Chrispy!
http://www.baitnet.com/search.php?action=statelist&state=ON&todisplay=25&letter=C&letter=A I don't know if this may help?
Thanks so much!!  Yes, this is very useful!!!  Chrispy!
Lol...Ohio, have you considered a late career in research data?? It doesn't matter what or where, you get the answers!!!
LOL, I am like the potted plant in the house, I can't do much else but sit in a chair and explore!
Interesting.  ANDY'S FIREWORKS & TACKLE  Made me think of the Old cartoon,  Dynamite to get fish. LOL
